title: Bachelor of Science in Early Childhood Education
description: Make a difference in the lives of young learners when you earn an Early Childhood Education (ECE) degree from Kennesaw State University. The ECE: Birth through Kindergarten program prepares you to support children during their formative years by promoting positive social, emotional, and cognitive development. With a diverse curriculum that covers important topics in early childhood education, graduates will be qualified to work as preschool teachers and daycare providers.
school: Department of Elementary and Early Childhood Education
